column4: I just upgraded to the new Ubuntu version and now i've no sound. :(
are you speakers turned on? Check if sound is muted in volume control.
Hey i use a well working transmitter.
and yes my surround system is turned on.
check if mute is on, this gets me all the time.
It's not.
check in Preferences -> Sound maybe something is off there
I'm an IT technician meaning i do all these checks before talking into this channel.
I don't know your background, can't assume your level of expertise :)
I know that's why i said this to you.
I know Windows an awful lot more than Ubuntu. :)
Should my ALSA Mixer need updating?
don't know. Hard to tell.
no no no it can't be that.
It was working before the upgrade.
So what could it be?
don't know. Never really had problem with sound.
Sorry...
May be someone else can help
Does anyone else know the answer to my question?
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1845555
and http://www.google.com/search?gcx=w&sourceid=chrome&ie=UTF-8&q=ubuntu+11.10+no+sound
